languages.text: {n}Осклабившись, гигант искоса взирает на вас. На его грубом лице огромными буквами написано хитрое самодовольство, которое он безуспешно пытается скрыть.{/n} "Была у меня пара мыслей на сей счет. Но ты не спеши их выпытывать — когда они придутся к месту, я поделюсь ими".

{n}The giant Space Marine casts you a sidelong look, grinning broadly. Wily self-satisfaction is writ large across his harsh features, though he tries to hide it.{/n} "I have had a few thoughts on that score. But don't try to pry them out of me — when the time comes, I will share them with you."
languages.original_text: {n}Осклабившись, гигант искоса взирает на вас. На его грубом лице огромными буквами написано хитрое самодовольство, которое он безуспешно пытается скрыть.{/n} "Была у меня пара мыслей на сей счет. Но ты не спеши их выпытывать — когда они придутся к месту, я поделюсь ими".

Wily self-satisfaction is writ large across his harsh features, though he tries to hide it.{/n} "I have had a few thoughts on that score. But don't try to pry them out of me — when the time comes, I will share them with you."

But don't try to pry them out of me — when the time comes, I will share them with you."

languages.text: {n}这位壮硕的星际战士瞥了你一眼，咧嘴大笑。尽管他努力克制着自己的表情，但他严厉的脸上还是露出了一丝狡猾与自满。{/n}“关于这个问题，我确实有几个想法。不过，别打算撬开我的嘴巴。等时机成熟的时候，我会告诉你的。”
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine casts you a sidelong look, grinning broadly. Wily self-satisfaction is writ large across his harsh features, though he tries to hide it.{/n} "I have had a few thoughts on that score. But don't try to pry them out of me — when the time comes, I will share them with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位壮硕的星际战士瞥了你一眼，咧嘴大笑。尽管他努力克制着自己的表情，但他严厉的脸上还是露出了一丝狡猾与自满。{/n}“关于这个问题，我确实有几个想法。不过，别打算撬开我的嘴巴。等时机成熟的时候，我会告诉你的。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}El enorme Marine Espacial te mira de reojo, sonriendo de oreja a oreja. Su satisfacción es visible en sus ásperos rasgos, aunque intenta ocultarla.{/n} «Tengo algunas ideas al respecto, pero no intente sonsacármelas. Cuando llegue el momento, las compartiré con usted».
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine casts you a sidelong look, grinning broadly. Wily self-satisfaction is writ large across his harsh features, though he tries to hide it.{/n} "I have had a few thoughts on that score. But don't try to pry them out of me — when the time comes, I will share them with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}El enorme Marine Espacial te mira de reojo, sonriendo de oreja a oreja. Su satisfacción es visible en sus ásperos rasgos, aunque intenta ocultarla.{/n} «Tengo algunas ideas al respecto, pero no intente sonsacármelas. Cuando llegue el momento, las compartiré con usted».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}巨大なスペースマリーンは横目であなたを見て、大きく笑った。彼はそれを隠そうとしているが、その厳しい顔には狡猾な自己満足が大きく現れていた。{/n}「その点については、少し考えていることがある。だが、俺からそれを引き出そうとはするな…時が来れば、お前に教えてやれるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine casts you a sidelong look, grinning broadly. Wily self-satisfaction is writ large across his harsh features, though he tries to hide it.{/n} "I have had a few thoughts on that score. But don't try to pry them out of me — when the time comes, I will share them with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大なスペースマリーンは横目であなたを見て、大きく笑った。彼はそれを隠そうとしているが、その厳しい顔には狡猾な自己満足が大きく現れていた。{/n}「その点については、少し考えていることがある。だが、俺からそれを引き出そうとはするな…時が来れば、お前に教えてやれるだろう」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der riesige Space Marine blickt dich von der Seite her an und grinst breit. Verschlagene Selbstzufriedenheit steht ihm ins grobe Gesicht geschrieben, auch wenn er sie zu verbergen versucht.{/n} "Ich hatte dazu schon den einen oder anderen Gedanken. Aber versucht nicht, sie aus mir herauszubekommen — wenn die Zeit gekommen ist, werde ich sie mit Euch teilen."
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine casts you a sidelong look, grinning broadly. Wily self-satisfaction is writ large across his harsh features, though he tries to hide it.{/n} "I have had a few thoughts on that score. But don't try to pry them out of me — when the time comes, I will share them with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der riesige Space Marine blickt dich von der Seite her an und grinst breit. Verschlagene Selbstzufriedenheit steht ihm ins grobe Gesicht geschrieben, auch wenn er sie zu verbergen versucht.{/n} "Ich hatte dazu schon den einen oder anderen Gedanken. Aber versucht nicht, sie aus mir herauszubekommen — wenn die Zeit gekommen ist, werde ich sie mit Euch teilen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le gigantesque Space Marine vous fixe du coin de l'œil, souriant de toutes ses dents. Un air suffisant et empreint de fierté, qu'il essaie tant bien que mal de cacher, se dessine sur son visage buriné.{/n} « J'avais réfléchi à quelques petites choses. Mais n'essayez pas de me tirer les vers du nez. Je vous en ferai part lorsque le moment sera venu. »
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine casts you a sidelong look, grinning broadly. Wily self-satisfaction is writ large across his harsh features, though he tries to hide it.{/n} "I have had a few thoughts on that score. But don't try to pry them out of me — when the time comes, I will share them with you."

Un air suffisant et empreint de fierté, qu'il essaie tant bien que mal de cacher, se dessine sur son visage buriné.{/n} « J'avais réfléchi à quelques petites choses. Mais n'essayez pas de me tirer les vers du nez. Je vous en ferai part lorsque le moment sera venu. »

languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine casts you a sidelong look, grinning broadly. Wily self-satisfaction is writ large across his harsh features, though he tries to hide it.{/n} "I have had a few thoughts on that score. But don't try to pry them out of me — when the time comes, I will share them with you."

languages.text: {n}Devasa Uzay Piyadesi sana yan yan bakıp koca ağzıyla sırıtıyor. Gizlemeye çalışsa da sert simasından kurnazca bir memnuniyet okunuyor.{/n} "Bu konuyu biraz düşündüm. Fakat ağzımdan laf almaya çalışma. Vakit geldiğinde planlarımı seninle paylaşacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine casts you a sidelong look, grinning broadly. Wily self-satisfaction is writ large across his harsh features, though he tries to hide it.{/n} "I have had a few thoughts on that score. But don't try to pry them out of me — when the time comes, I will share them with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Devasa Uzay Piyadesi sana yan yan bakıyor ve koca ağzıyla sırıtıyor. Gizlemeye çalışsa da kurnazca bir memnuniyet sert simasından okunuyor.{/n} "Bu konuyu biraz düşündüm. Fakat ağzımdan laf almaya çalışma. Doğru zaman geldiğinde seninle planlarımı paylaşacağım."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
